title: Sizzix, Multi Color, One Size Magnetic Platform for Wafer-Thin Dies 656499
description: The attraction is obvious! for perfect registration, the Size magnetic platform uses high-grade magnets to hold thin its, frameless and other chemically-etched, wafer-thin dies securely in place during cutting. This makes them instantly compatible with the BIG kick, big shot, big shot pro and Vagabond machines. To die-cut one layer of thin material using Size frameless, thin its and other chemically-etched wafer-thin dies, the magnetic platform is required along with cutting pads. The diagrams on the magnetic platform and its tabs offer easy guidelines about how to make the perfect Size sandwich.
